website_summaries.verdict: Formulated without harsh chemicals, this product can be used on the entire face and is particularly suited for removing waterproof mascara.
pros: A vegan product that has been sustainably sourced
Organic ingredients and a pleasant scent
Customer service is attentive and eager to please
cons: Product has not been ophthalmologist tested, but there is a 30-day return policy

customer_reviews.title: Works well and smells great!
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive skin and break out easily or get a rash with certain products. I found this make up remover best to remove all eye make up (and I use water-proof mascara, liquid eye liner and eyeshadow daily!) The smell is great but a bit too strong for me for all over my face... but smell aside, it works really well and is gentle enough. I use to use Philosophy's (before they discontinued it) and I have to say I think I like this one more! Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Make up remover
customer_reviews.text: I want to love this product. It smells so great, but it just doesn’t do the job. I wear mascara only and using this I felt like in order to remove the mascara (even after holding it to my eye for 10 seconds before wiping it off) I had to scrub it off and I don’t wear waterproof mascara. This may work for other make up, but for me this isn’t the answer.
customer_reviews.author: Just Me and My Coffee

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use, but Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I tried and tried to get my eye makeup off, but it refused to budge with this cleaner. I was very disappointed since it is organic, and I prefer organic products, especially when it comes to my face. This cleanser simply doesn't fit the bill. I do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Best makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this product! As an esthetician I am very picky about what I put on my skin. The natural organic ingredients are what initally drew me to this product. It gently removes all makeup, even mascara. It doesn’t strip the skin leaving you dry, And it’s not greasy. The natural scent is amazing! It’s perfect! I definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna H

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I was having Very bad reactions to regular make up remover to the point where I couldn’t wear make up until it cleared up. This stuff works wonders and doesn’t give me any kind of allergic reaction. Perfect for sensitive skin I will continue using this product because I’m afraid of using something else and my reaction comes back.
customer_reviews.author: mscar

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. I was searching for a makeup remover that wasn’t full of chemicals and was gentle enough for my sensitive skin. This makeup remover smells so good, like a dreamsicle, but it’s not an over powering scent. Usually my makeup comes off with about two cotton pads with some drops on it. It’s not the best for removing waterproof mascara, I usually have to add a little bit of coconut oil to get everything off. My skin always smells so good and feels so soft after that I almost hate to wash it off.
customer_reviews.author: J&C Arthur

customer_reviews.title: Super impressed!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've been on the hunt for an oil-free non-toxic eye makeup remover and I feel like I FINALLY found one!! I just got this today and used it for the first time. It took off my eye makeup easily and without much effort. Smells amazing too! I put some on a cotton square pad and that's how I took off my makeup. I will 100% buy this again, next time in the larger size as this is a winner for me! <3
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: A very nice product
customer_reviews.text: This product is for face makeup removal. It smells wonderful and does remove makeup and makes my face feel moisturized and soft. The only thing that I don’t like is you have to use more than a small amount to completely clean. I used a cotton pad not ball and used enough to make it wet, using 2 pads and still could have used more to have the pad come clean.
customer_reviews.author: pianobiz

customer_reviews.title: False advertisement Does not remove water proof makeup
customer_reviews.text: This stuff smells great(like oranges) but absolutely doesn’t get the water proof make up off. I has to use a lot pressure to remove my foundation and eye shadow. My eye liner and mascara (the only water proof products on my face) We’re just smeared around And my eye lashes were all stuck together and what not. I hate to throw things out but this will be going out with the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael

customer_reviews.title: Works good just have to use a lot of it.
customer_reviews.text: I was really hoping this makeup remover would wow me. It works fairly well. However I do feel like I am having to use a whole lot of it to get good results when taking off anything waterproof. I will say that I got a bit in my eye and surprisingly it didn't burn so that is a bonus. I just wish that it would come in a larger size considering the amount that I need to use every day to get my makeup off effectively.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love this, but it just doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to love this makeup remover and tried it for a month, but it just doesn't work at all. I mainly wanted it to help with removing my mascara (normal mascara, not waterproof), but since I started using it I've had multiple issues with my eyes hurting like they have old make-up on them. This stuff went in the trash and I'll just stick to using my witch hazel which works great!
customer_reviews.author: Potter Party of 3

customer_reviews.title: Only good for old makeup
customer_reviews.text: It smells great and does take off makeup the next morning. But it's useless if you make a mistake with your gel eyeliner and need to fix it. Other makeup removers have done this fine, but this one barely does anything. I had to really scrub with it and 2 days later, my skin is still red and stinging.
customer_reviews.author: cmn

customer_reviews.title: OUCH!
customer_reviews.text: This burned my eyes so badly, I thought it might have damaged them. I do not have sensitive skin so not sure what happened here. I love the other products I have purchased from this brand, but this one is a hard NO. Not only did it burn, it didn't even remove the makeup. I'll stick with cleansing oil.
customer_reviews.author: Jaiye

customer_reviews.title: Awesome eye makeup remover!!
customer_reviews.text: This eye makeup remover works great and smells good. Took all my eyeshadow, eyeliner, mascara, and under eye concealer right off. I can’t believe I found a clean product that works. I ALSO really like the facial sunscreen this company makes.
customer_reviews.author: Martita

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes with product it burns my eyes or I have to really scrub to get it to work. I am amazed with this product and will continue to use it. No burning, no scrubbing, no plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Sean Timmons

customer_reviews.title: Doesnt work for me
customer_reviews.text: It does NOT remove all of my mascera (not water proof) or eye liner (waterproof. Kat Von Dee Tattoo liner). I always have makeup left on my eyes. I do not use a cotton pad, i just use my hands as to not create more waste. Maybe if you use a cotton pad it will work but that tells you that the cotton is finishing the job, not the makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Wilson

customer_reviews.title: A little bit does not go a long way...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this hoping to save money as I figured makeup remover wipes are more expensive. Turns out you have to use at least four cotton balls and a lot of the remover to actually get your makeup off. Smells nice, but would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Not as effective as major brand name Makeup Removers
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy that this product is organic and "better for you" but it doesn't do the job as well as major brand names like Lancome Bi-Facial or Artistry makeup remover. It does smell nice and I'll use it up but I won't be repurchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Din0nugget

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, not oily, but hard to remove mascara
customer_reviews.text: I was waking up with goo and crust in my eyes. Thought it was pink eye but the doctor confirmed it was not. He said the ducts were clogged and I assume it was from the makeup remover balm I was using so I decided to try this oil free natural remover and I really like it (especially the lovely smell and that it is not oily), but it does take some effort to remove mascara. Since my eyes are clear when I wake up, it's worth the extra few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: tennisgirl

customer_reviews.title: Good remove with a citrus smell.
customer_reviews.text: This product is good. I liked the orange smell. I did find it lacked in its ability to remove eye makeup but I use a specific product for that anyways. Over al good product. It does have a sting orange smell so if you are sensitive to smells I would avoid it. Personally, I enjoy the smell.
customer_reviews.author: Chantel Lasky

customer_reviews.title: You'll never buy another makeup remover once you try this product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this makeup remover. It is perfect for removing eye makeup and even face makeup. I just put a little on a cotton ball. It smells delicious. It doesn't leave a greasy residue at all, which is important to me around the eyes. All of the Beauty by Earth products are amazing. You won't regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Azile68

customer_reviews.title: Not as Expected & Caused a Stye
customer_reviews.text: It did not remove my makeup very well. Not lubricant enough or something. It absorbed into my skin very fast and therefore not easy to spread all over my face. Also after 2 uses, I got a stye on my right eye. I RARELY get styes. The only thing I think could have caused it was this remover.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Best remover I’ve used!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t really care for organic stuff but I love this because it doesn’t leave my face oily or dry and never dries out or irritates my eyes that are really sensitive to other cleansers. The smell is nice and fruity but not strong and it removes all my makeup with ease.
customer_reviews.author: Isabel Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This smells great. I like that I can use a cotton pad and no water is required to rinse. Very convenient for both home and travel use. I don’t wear a ton of makeup so it only takes one cotton pad for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Walden

customer_reviews.title: Effective and Tear-Free
customer_reviews.text: I like it. I used it after using my face wash for the stubborn mascara and it did awesome removing it entirely and didn’t sting my eyes at all. I live the slight orange scent. It makes me feel and smell all fresh after.
customer_reviews.author: Phenyx

customer_reviews.title: Natural product that really works!
customer_reviews.text: All natural makeup remover that actually works. It smells fantastic and is very gentle on extremely sensitive skin. Any other makeup remover I have tried has always irritated me. So very happy to test this product.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Banks

customer_reviews.title: Love the crunchy aspect but it doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: I'm a granola girl so I loved the thought of having an all natural alternative to the make up removers found in the store but it doesn't work. It doesn't work on regular mascara and definitely not on waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Nacona Ward

customer_reviews.title: Refreshing facial treat!
customer_reviews.text: Refreshing! I love this makeup remover my face and eyes feel so clean after I apply and wipe off. The natural orange fragrance is my favorite just so refreshing. I can't wait to wash off my make up at night and thats a good thing! I need encouragement after a long day with the kids and whatever else is going on. I highly recommend this special facial treat! Makes a great girlfriend gift as well!
customer_reviews.author: Greg L Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing for sensitive skin!
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of rosacea on my face and even “sensitive skin” makeup remover wipes make my face burn. Not this stuff! Tough on mascara, not oily at all (slight citrus scent from some essential oil but it’s the last ingredient), and it’s gentle on the especially sensitive skin around my eyes. No gross residue to clog pores. Will be buying again when I run out. ❤️
customer_reviews.author: Morgan B

customer_reviews.title: Not the best...
customer_reviews.text: I love almost all other Beauty by Earth products, but for some reason this did not meet my expectations. It has a nice smell and did not irritate or hurt when I used to take off eye make-up. However, it took almost half the bottle to take off the very little eye-makeup I was wearing. I even soaked a cotton ball then let it sit on my eye and it still took over 10+ cotton balls to get it all off. Want to keep using because I love the company and their other products, but not sure it is worth taking 30 minutes to remove make-up.
customer_reviews.author: kittymama4

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite makeup remover. I usually wear a waterproof eyeliner and it can be difficult to remove with other products, but not this one. It comes off with ease and also smells amazing! Will definitely continue to order.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Klem

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: This did not take off the eye make well at all. Didn't care for the scent either.
customer_reviews.author: Adarose

customer_reviews.title: Great remover and smells lovely
customer_reviews.text: This remover seems to remove makeup without stripping my face to the point it is dry, like other removers I have tried. I use after cleansing but many time use just the remover and it works well and smells fresh and clean. Have bought bottles for my daughters and mom and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Cgarbry

customer_reviews.title: Loooove this !
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I use it with washable/reusable makeup remover pads. It smells amazing and it’s too oily.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Smell good, works well.
customer_reviews.text: It works really well, super lite, not oily at all. I have combo/ semi acne prone skin. This makeup remover doesnt leave any gross feeling residue on my skin, and I havent noticed any negative effects on my skin by using it. (Ive been using it for about 1 month now) The only think i dont like is that it doesnt take off mascara very well, and stings if any gets in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious scent, super effective
customer_reviews.text: This seems to dissolve eye makeup in seconds. The scent is beautiful and the product is gentle on sensitive skin, while being incredibly effective. This is a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Pleasant scent, effective
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. I was pleasantly surprised by the orange aroma and it works great at removing stubborn makeup like mascara. I’ll be buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy J Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Lovely scent smooths skin
customer_reviews.text: I normally used regular facewash to remove my makeup but this does a much better job. It leaves my skin soft and glowy and the smell is amazing
customer_reviews.author: krazimom

customer_reviews.title: Gentle yet effective
customer_reviews.text: I use this for both a makeup remover and to clean my face in between washes. Removes dirt and oil without drying me out too much
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten

customer_reviews.title: smells fantastic
customer_reviews.text: I love simple and clean ingredients, it smells fantastic, easy removes make up, not greasy as other oils
customer_reviews.author: maria prokopenko

customer_reviews.title: Awesome eye make up remover
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried this on waterproof mascara yet, but it works wonderfully on everything else! Put on a cotton pad, place on eye for about 5 seconds and then gently wipe away...It works better than the chemical eye makeup removers I've tried and I don't have to worry about the chemicals. A win win!
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Won’t remove waterproof makeup
customer_reviews.text: This product stated it could remove waterproof makeup with very little amount. Totally not true. I had to apply 3 times just to be able to take waterproof mascara off, and it still didn’t come off completely. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: A.V.

customer_reviews.title: amazed by this product
customer_reviews.text: first time using this brand and i am truly amazed by it. Doesn't leave oil residue at all, amazing scent and the best part its cruelty free!!!
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't work for me, it did not remove the water proof mascara.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Gently, non- oily remover
customer_reviews.text: I really like the subtle smell of this makeup remover. It took off my makeup without feeling to oily - I hate that about some removers! Would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nikki M

customer_reviews.title: best eye makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: this is the only clean product that removes eyelash glue residue without any fuss!
customer_reviews.author: Vrom

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping for a makeup remover that would take off my waterproof mascara, this did not. It takes off my foundation and blush just fine and has a slight orange scent to it. Not what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret E. Jones

customer_reviews.title: No thank you
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to be able to leave a good review, but truthfully the product didn't wow me. The product was irritating for my eyes probably because of the orange essential oil, and I dont feel as though it was very effective. After every use I still had product in my Lashes and around my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing, doesn’t work well on eye makeup
customer_reviews.text: I’m very pleased with the scent and the consistency of the product, but as someone who wears heavy dark eye makeup, It simply doesn’t work to remove it all. I have to scrub for so long that my skin is raw and I’ll still have black around my eyelashes. For the price it’s not worth it unfortunately
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good product!
customer_reviews.text: This is my go to face cleaner at this point. It works really well and doesn’t leave my skin dry!
customer_reviews.author: K. Harris

customer_reviews.title: great small 👌
customer_reviews.text: the small is amazing!! Remove very good make up (But for long lasting make up you should use oil make up remover) Very happy with the product ☺
customer_reviews.author: Malka

customer_reviews.title: Clean and Healthy Skin
customer_reviews.text: I have sensitive skin and this product is gentle and soothing! Removes all make-up like a dream leaving my skin clean and it smells wonderful! I will always support this product!
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: It’s organic!
customer_reviews.text: The organic eye make up remover is the best I’ve ever used. Ingredients-perfect, always try to get organic. The make up glides off, especially around eye area, no Skin pulling. The consistency is great, not oily or creamy, both of which I’ve used and it’s not good for the eye area. It gets a 5 rating from my experience.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Doesn't sting.
customer_reviews.text: This is the best eye makeup remover I've used. It does a good job on every makeup I've used, and doesn't sting at all. Not greasy or drying.
customer_reviews.author: Christy S.

customer_reviews.title: I thought it was wonderful! It was gentle and effective and I am ...
customer_reviews.text: I ordered your makeup remover on Amazon.com and used it for the first time last evening. I thought it was wonderful! It was gentle and effective and I am very pleased with this so far.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time yesterday. So far so good, works good I just Hohhot that it would be a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: linda

customer_reviews.title: Natural all the way
customer_reviews.text: Great product, easy to use, all natural ingredients, no harmful chemicals, easy on your skin. Love it. Will buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: C. LaRosa

customer_reviews.title: Hard to take off
customer_reviews.text: I wear alot of black makeup on my eyes and this didnt help much with removing, need to be a little tougher to remove. the scent is nice I just use it now to apply to my face
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely LOVE this product
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this product! I have tried expensive, department store brands, designer brands and none of them have worked as well as this. It's natural, does NOT irritate my sensitive eyes a bit and is extremely effective! Love love love love love love!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really works
customer_reviews.text: I love this make up remover! It gets rid of everything and doesn't leave your skin feeling dry or oily. I just wish it came in a bigger bottle
customer_reviews.author: CLee

customer_reviews.title: Must try product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely loved this product!! Even noticed it helping my acne! Will be a long term user of this product. The light cleanse of make up remover, with the citrus smell. Perfect container. Def fits description "pure and gental". Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Leaves face feeling clean
customer_reviews.text: This is an overall good product that doesn’t leave an oily feel to your face. It took two cotton pads to fully remove all the make up from my face.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly L.

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good!
customer_reviews.text: This smells so good and is great to use for an all natural makeup remover. I recommend this to anyone who is trying to go cruelty-free regarding their makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Kiara

customer_reviews.title: Best Make up Remover ever
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money! No greasy feeling and gets all the make up off with one swipe.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Baldonado

customer_reviews.title: Smells Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing and is more moisturizing than the other stuff I’ve been using. I sometimes need to grab a second cotton ball to clean under my eyelids once more but I also wear two layers of mascara on my top and bottom lashes.
customer_reviews.author: crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great product but does not remove waterproof mascara like I hoped.
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact it’s organic and natural... I’m sure it’s a great product to remove makeup and I see that it works great to remove waterproof liners/pencils, but I was looking something more for waterproof mascara, this product does not remove the waterproof mascara.
customer_reviews.author: maribel langi

customer_reviews.title: Tonic
customer_reviews.text: This is more like a tonic. Good ingredients. But if you want to remove waterproof make up you got use an oily remover. This is not oil at all and it’s hard to remove well the make up
customer_reviews.author: Cgongz23

customer_reviews.title: Fresh orange sent and nice clean soft face
customer_reviews.text: I love the fresh orange sent. This cleaner left my face feeling clean and soft with out a film.
customer_reviews.author: Tina

customer_reviews.title: And even on the face it left a feeling of dryness and didn't feel good on my skin
customer_reviews.text: there is something in this product that irritates my eyes to the point that I had tears when I tried to remove the make up with it. And even on the face it left a feeling of dryness and didn't feel good on my skin. Maybe it doesn't suit my skin, but it didn't feel like it was organic.
customer_reviews.author: Iryna Radko

customer_reviews.title: useless
customer_reviews.text: My eye makeup didn't come off well, even though I didn't put on heavy eye makeup. Especially mascara. Once used, it is left untouched. I don't want to give the rating.
customer_reviews.author: Rani

customer_reviews.title: although it isn't the best at removing waterproof mascara and it is a bit ...
customer_reviews.text: It works well, although it isn't the best at removing waterproof mascara and it is a bit pricey for how much product you get. But it smells great, it did not irritate my skin, and it served its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Lady_DarBear

customer_reviews.title: Not for long wear makeup, good as a toner
customer_reviews.text: This is more like a toner than a makeup remover. I love that it's cruelty free and more natural but it did almost nothing to my liquid eyeliner or liquid lipstick. It smeared everything but i couldn't get long lasting makeup off with this. I was able to take off most of my foundation. If you wear liquid lipsticks just be aware this won't remove it.
customer_reviews.author: Ophelia

customer_reviews.title: Must have makeup remover
customer_reviews.text: This is a must have product. It has a nice fragrance & it left my skin feeling great after removing my makeup. I highly recommend this makeup remover.
customer_reviews.author: melissa stewart

customer_reviews.title: Irritated my eye!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is supposed to be make up remover and a bit got in my eye and it has been killing now for 24 hours. Dangerous! Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew L.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t Work :( I returned it. Really wanted a natural product. Too bad.
customer_reviews.author: Stella Kim

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients however not very good with taking my eye makeup off, Unfortunately so I returned it
customer_reviews.author: Bridget M.

customer_reviews.title: Works good, non-irritating
customer_reviews.text: I have very sensitive eyes but this stuff does not irritate. It removes my facial make-up pretty easily and smells great! I have ordered another bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Kristi from California

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work for me..
customer_reviews.text: This product did not work to remove my eye makeup. I use Tom Ford mascara and Mac eye makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: Best Makeup Remover Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best makeup remover I’ve ever had! It feels great on my eyes, works efficiently, and smells good. It is soothing to the skin and completely non-irritating.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Great for sensitive skin and/or anyone looking for a "natural" make-up remover!
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at both the ingredient list and the efficacy of this makeup remover. The light orange smell is pleasant, and there is absolutely no burning or stinging, even when removing eye make-up!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ferderer

customer_reviews.title: Smells amazing. Takes makeup off really good.❤️
customer_reviews.text: Awesome smelling makeup remover, good for your skin. The only downside is the plastic bottle.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Product!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect product for sensitive skins...I used to hurt my eye when using some products but I think I will be a regular customer of this brand from now! Go for it!
customer_reviews.author: Prajakta

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t remove makeup
customer_reviews.text: Really like the all natural ingredients, but it doesn’t remove makeup. I only wear eyeliner and mascara, all this product seems to do is smear it around.
customer_reviews.author: mary fraser smith

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product
customer_reviews.text: Removes makeup gently and has very pleasant smell ! Best product
customer_reviews.author: Alina

customer_reviews.title: Remover
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is wonderful! Easily removes makeup! Smells great and super product line!
customer_reviews.author: Helen Nicholson

customer_reviews.title: Great Makeup Remover
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this product. I love the scent and it only takes a few drops to remove a face full of makeup.
customer_reviews.author: Tawny O'Brien

customer_reviews.title: I am very pleased with it
customer_reviews.text: I've reordered this many times. I am very pleased with it. It does a good job at removing makeup, is reasonably priced, has a pleasing fragrance, and I appreciate that it is made with mostly organic ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: CGreen

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not the greatest but definitely works great with eye makeup!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use and accurate
customer_reviews.text: I loved the way it made my eyes feel after I used it, almost like a massage oil. And the citrus scent is very nice. I have used others that were stronger but I really like this one.
customer_reviews.author: Lynda Karger

customer_reviews.title: Bought for eyes, said avoid getting in eyes
customer_reviews.text: I didn't even use this as i bought it for removing eye makeup and it said avoid getting in eyes. Usually when you remove eye makeup it gets in your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: loloinslo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well with waterproof Mascara
customer_reviews.text: It smells really good vanilla and orange, but it didn't take my waterproof mascara off very well. I feel like I used a lot to try to take off my water proof mascara, maybe if you use regular mascara it'll work better. It takes off eye shadow perfectly though and it's more watery than oily. It's okay not really what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie J.

customer_reviews.title: Love the healthy ingredients but this didn't seem to easily ...
customer_reviews.text: Love the healthy ingredients but this didn't seem to easily take off my liquid eyelinder as I had hoped. But it smells good and feels good and works well for everything else.
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Smells divine!
customer_reviews.text: This smells amazing! My face feels so clean, every scrap of make up removed without drying and without leaving my face greasy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Anita M

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Love the feel and the smell but it takes a lot to get the make up off
customer_reviews.author: victoria close

customer_reviews.title: Love the smell!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this makeup remover. It got my mascara off wonderfully and smelled amazing! I love the orange scent.
customer_reviews.author: Downs

customer_reviews.title: Leaves skin feeling fresh and clean
customer_reviews.text: Love how my face feels after cleaning face, smells great, nongreasy
customer_reviews.author: KKay

customer_reviews.title: Wanted to love it
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to love it but it doesn’t take off eye makeup very well (and I don’t even wear much). It was gone in about 2 weeks because I had to use so much to get it off! I’m all about products with natural, non-toxic ingredients, but it didn’t work well enough for me to buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gentle and natural
customer_reviews.text: This is a good remover for simple ingredients and good value. Much better than neutrogena.
customer_reviews.author: JCJ

customer_reviews.title: This product works great
customer_reviews.text: A product that works great and doesn’t have unnecessary ingredients in it! It’s not oily and it’s smells good. Very happy with this line.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Melo

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t remove mascara well
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to remove the small amount of mascara (not waterproof) I wear. It doesn’t work well, so I returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Makeup Remover - Organic & Natural Ingredients, Use with Eye Makeup Remover Wipes or Pads, Oil Free Makeup Remover Leaves Face Cleaner and Deals with Removing Waterproof Makeup, Zero Residue on Skin
product_meta.description:
Size:4.7 Ounce Introducing the most effective all natural make up remover. Crafted with a carefully chosen combination of natural ingredients, our makeup remover clears away sweat, oil, dirt, makeup, and any other buildup that’s cluttering up your complexion. No need to buy expensive makeup remover wipes or makeup removing cloths. This unique, oil-free formula can take off even the most stubborn waterproof mascara and cosmetics. 
Conventional products rely on harsh and sometimes dangerous chemicals to clear away buildup. Our mineral oil free makeup remover is a natural alternative. Made with ingredients that work with your skin instead of against it, this make up remover plays well with all skin types, even sensitive ones. 

At Beauty by Earth, we pride ourselves on finding and using only the highest quality natural ingredients. We’re also Leaping Bunny certified, so you can be confident that our products are cruelty free and no animal testing was used in the creation of any of our products. For natural beauty add our makeup remover to your cart today. You’re going to love the difference it makes.
feature_bullets: SOOTHING EFFECTIVE FORMULA: This simple make up remover is gentle but effective. No need to use special wipes or different brands of cleansing oil. This micellar water easily removes waterproof eye or facial cosmetics, even the toughest mascara doesn’t stand a chance. Take your face from "blah" to "ah" by getting rid of oil, sweat, dirt, and anything else that's built up on your face.

NO OILY RESIDUE: Makeup removers that contain harsh chemicals work against your skin instead of with it. By switching to our gentle makeup remover, you can wash your face and reduce your risk of acne breakouts without harming your skin. Mineral oil free, completely natural, and made without anything potentially harmful or toxic, our beauty water is balanced for any skin type.

SAFE FOR YOU, GOOD FOR THE EARTH: You don't have to choose between beauty and ethics. Our makeup remover is vegan, paraben free, sustainably sourced, Made in the USA and 100% cruelty free. Even better, each ingredient we use is carefully chosen to support your skin's health. Your complexion will look and feel better naturally, and you'll never have to worry about what you're putting on it.

MOISTURIZING AND HYDRATING: Are you crazy about your complexion? When you wipe off your makeup with our simple makeup remover, you will see how gentle but effective it is! Like micellar cleansing water you will experience how easily it cleanses and removes without needing any harsh rubbing or over-drying. With a fresh, clean face you'll feel better knowing its natural & organic ingredients and your skin will thank you.

LOVE IT OR LET US KNOW: We know you're gonna love what our makeup remover can do. We're so confident that we'll even guarantee it. Every product we sell comes with a 1 year, 100% Customer Satisfaction Guarantee. If at any point over the next year you don't love your product, just send it back and we'll give you a full refund - no awkward questions required.
